org.apache.flink.configuration

类 BlobServerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.BlobServerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class BlobServerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration options for the BlobServer and BlobCache.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> CLEANUP_INTERVAL
      Cleanup interval of the blob caches at the task managers (in seconds).
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_BACKLOG
      The config parameter defining the backlog of BLOB fetches on the JobManager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_CONCURRENT
      The config parameter defining the maximum number of concurrent BLOB fetches that the JobManager serves.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_RETRIES
      The config parameter defining number of retires for failed BLOB fetches.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> OFFLOAD_MINSIZE
      The minimum size for messages to be offloaded to the BlobServer.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PORT
      The config parameter defining the server port of the blob service.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> SSL_ENABLED
      Flag to override ssl support for the blob service transport.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> STORAGE_DIRECTORY
      The config parameter defining the storage directory to be used by the blob server.

    • 字段详细资料

      • STORAGE_DIRECTORY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> STORAGE_DIRECTORY
        The config parameter defining the storage directory to be used by the blob server.

      • FETCH_RETRIES

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_RETRIES
        The config parameter defining number of retires for failed BLOB fetches.

      • FETCH_CONCURRENT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_CONCURRENT
        The config parameter defining the maximum number of concurrent BLOB fetches that the JobManager serves.

      • FETCH_BACKLOG

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FETCH_BACKLOG
        The config parameter defining the backlog of BLOB fetches on the JobManager.

      • PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PORT
        The config parameter defining the server port of the blob service. The port can either be a port, such as "9123", a range of ports: "50100-50200" or a list of ranges and or points: "50100-50200,50300-50400,51234" Setting the port to 0 will let the OS choose an available port.

      • SSL_ENABLED

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> SSL_ENABLED
        Flag to override ssl support for the blob service transport.

      • CLEANUP_INTERVAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> CLEANUP_INTERVAL
        Cleanup interval of the blob caches at the task managers (in seconds).

        Whenever a job is not referenced at the cache anymore, we set a TTL and let the periodic cleanup task (executed every CLEANUP_INTERVAL seconds) remove its blob files after this TTL has passed. This means that a blob will be retained at most 2 * CLEANUP_INTERVAL seconds after not being referenced anymore. Therefore, a recovery still has the chance to use existing files rather than to download them again.

      • OFFLOAD_MINSIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> OFFLOAD_MINSIZE
        The minimum size for messages to be offloaded to the BlobServer.
